Ok. Some of the comments on this are quite confusing so I'd just like to clear it up for people.

It IS dual audio. I'm using VLC and you just right click -> audio -> audio track. They both say "english" but if you choose the 2nd option it's in the original japanese.

The first audio track is the professionally done english version made by disney. Disney's audio versions of the studio ghibli films do have a different "emotional feel?" to them, and personally I prefer the japanese audio with english subtitles for all the films.

You can choose either one with this torrent but you will have to download the english subtitle as it's not included.

This version which I also got from TPB Whisper.Of.The.Heart.1995.480p.BluRay.x264-mSD.mkv contains the japanese audio and english subtitles and is less blurry + smaller file size.
